test.GetList1: SELECT 批准开工时间 AS JIHUA, 实际开工时间 AS SHIJI, 工作主题 AS JIANXIUNEIRONG, 申请单位 AS SHENQINGDANWEI, 检修业务状态 AS USERSTATE , t.ABSTRACT AS CZP, 批准完工时间 AS JIHUAEND, 实际完工时间 AS SHIJIEND FROM OPTKUSER.V_REPAIR r LEFT JOIN OPTKUSER.TRPRTKRELATION rl ON r.SHEETID = rl.RPRTKID LEFT JOIN OPTKUSER.TTICKET t ON t.TICKETID = rl.CMDID
test.GetListByState:
same:GetList
WHERE 工作主题 LIKE '%{0}%' AND 检修业务状态='{1}'
test.GetListByStateTime:
same:GetList
WHERE 工作主题 LIKE '%{0}%' AND 检修业务状态='{1}' AND 批准开工时间>={2} AND 批准开工时间<{3}
test.GetMuluList:
same:GetList
WHERE 工作主题 LIKE '%{0}%' AND 批准开工时间>={1} AND 批准开工时间<{2}

jiangsu.Fields: PLAN_ID,PZKSSJ,PZJSSJ,content,'' as dept,CASE WHEN END_DATE IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN START_DATE IS NULL THEN '待执行' ELSE '执行中' END ELSE '已完结' END as state,'' as czp,START_DATE AS real_start_date,END_DATE as real_end_date
jiangsu.GetList:
select * from ( select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'GENERATOR' AS dev_type,s.name||d.name as devname from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_generator_f_outageplan p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_generator_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_commonsubstation_b s ON d.st_id=s.id UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'ACLINE',d.name from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_F_OUTAGEPLAN p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'PWRTRANSFM',s.name||d.name from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_PWRTRANSFM_F_OUTAGEPLAN p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_pwrtransfm_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_commonsubstation_b s ON d.st_id=s.id UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'BUSBAR',s.name||d.name from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_BUSBAR_F_OUTAGEPLAN p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_busbar_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_commonsubstation_b s ON d.st_id=s.id UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'BREAKER',s.name||d.name from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_BREAKER_F_OUTAGEPLAN p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_breaker_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_commonsubstation_b s ON d.st_id=s.id UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'DIS',s.name||d.name from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DIS_F_OUTAGEPLAN p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dis_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_commonsubstation_b s ON d.st_id=s.id UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'DCLINE',d.name from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_F_OUTAGEPLAN p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'DCPOLE',s.name||d.name from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_DCPOLE_F_OUTAGEPLAN p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_dcpole_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_commonsubstation_b s ON d.st_id=s.id ) A
jiangsu.GetListByState:
same:GetList
WHERE content LIKE '%{0}%' AND state={1}
jiangsu.GetListByStateTime:
same:GetList
WHERE content LIKE '%{0}%' AND state={1} AND PZKSSJ<{3} AND PZJSSJ>{2}
jiangsu.GetMuluList:
same:GetList
WHERE content LIKE '%{0}%' AND PZKSSJ<{2} AND PZJSSJ>{1}
jiangsu.GetNoFinishList:
select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'GENERATOR' AS dev_type,s.name||d.name as devname,s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_generator_f_outageplan p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_generator_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s ON d.st_id=s.id WHERE p.END_DATE IS NULL UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'ACLINE',d.name,'','','' from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_F_OUTAGEPLAN p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id WHERE p.END_DATE IS NULL UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'PWRTRANSFM',s.name||d.name,s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_PWRTRANSFM_F_OUTAGEPLAN p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_pwrtransfm_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id LEFT JOIN (same:sgc/main:GetStationCoordinate) s ON d.st_id=s.id WHERE p.END_DATE IS NULL UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'BUSBAR',s.name||d.name,s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_BUSBAR_F_OUTAGEPLAN p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_busbar_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id LEFT JOIN (same:sgc/main:GetStationCoordinate) s ON d.st_id=s.id WHERE p.END_DATE IS NULL UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'BREAKER',s.name||d.name,s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_BREAKER_F_OUTAGEPLAN p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_breaker_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id LEFT JOIN (same:sgc/main:GetStationCoordinate) s ON d.st_id=s.id WHERE p.END_DATE IS NULL UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'DIS',s.name||d.name,s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DIS_F_OUTAGEPLAN p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dis_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id LEFT JOIN (same:sgc/main:GetStationCoordinate) s ON d.st_id=s.id WHERE p.END_DATE IS NULL UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'DCLINE',d.name,'','','' from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_F_OUTAGEPLAN p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id WHERE p.END_DATE IS NULL UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'DCPOLE',d.name,s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_DCPOLE_F_OUTAGEPLAN p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_dcpole_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSTATION_B s ON d.st_id=s.id WHERE p.END_DATE IS NULL

ROOT.GetListByState:
same:GetList
WHERE content LIKE '%{0}%' AND state={1}
ROOT.GetListByStateTime:
same:GetList
WHERE content LIKE '%{0}%' AND state={1} AND START_DATE<{3} AND END_DATE>{2}
ROOT.GetMuluList:
same:GetList
WHERE content LIKE '%{0}%' AND START_DATE<{2} AND END_DATE>{1}
ROOT.GetNoFinishList:
select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'GENERATOR' AS dev_type,s.name||d.name as devname,s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_generator_f_outageplan p LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_generator_b d ON p.dev_id=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s ON d.st_id=s.id WHERE p.END_DATE IS NULL UNION ALL select same:Fields,p.dev_id,'ACLINE',d.name,'',0,0 from

ROOT.dump: where least(auth_start_date,nvl(start_date,auth_end_date))<{1} AND (end_date IS NULL OR greatest(auth_end_date,end_date)>{0})

sql.GetAllList:
select b.plan_id_d,b.auth_start_date,b.auth_end_date,b.start_date,b.end_date,b.dept,b.status,d.outage_dev_id,d.outage_dev_name,d.st_id from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_evn_outageplan_b_day b JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_evn_outageplan_r_day_dev d ON b.plan_id_d=d.plan_id_d where ((auth_end_date>{0} AND auth_start_date<{1}) OR (start_date < {1} AND (end_date>{0} OR end_date IS NULL))) AND STATUS<>1004 ORDER BY auth_start_date
sql.GetRealList:
select b.status,d.outage_dev_id,d.st_id,b.plan_id_d from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_evn_outageplan_b_day b JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_evn_outageplan_r_day_dev d ON b.plan_id_d=d.plan_id_d where ((auth_end_date>{0} AND auth_start_date<{1}) OR (start_date < {1} AND (end_date>{0} OR end_date IS NULL))) AND STATUS<>1004
